ray.rage.rendersystem.shader.glsl

Class AbstractGlslProgramInput<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ray.rage.rendersystem.shader.glsl.AbstractGlslProgramInput<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The generic type of input that can be passed to a GLSL shader program.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Disposable, Managed<GpuShaderProgram>, GpuShaderProgram.Input<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractGlslProgramLocatableInput, AbstractGlslProgramStorageBuffer

    abstract class AbstractGlslProgramInput<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements GpuShaderProgram.Input<T>
    Base implementation of the GpuShaderProgram.Input interface.
    Author:
    Raymond L. Rivera
